segments.text: Hey George , how is your chicken ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My chicken tastes all right , but it is pretty dry . How is your fish ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My fish is pretty dry too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's almost as if this food has been sitting a little too long . It doesn't seem fresh .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it seems that way to me also .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mine are the same way . It seems like they've been overcooked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't usually complain , but I think that we should mention this to the waiter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . Maybe they can bring us some better food .
segments.speaker: S2
